alert.note: Alert for Allamakee; Clayton; Fayette; Winneshiek (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 31 at 2:10AM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Clayton, Fayette, Allamakee and Winneshiek Counties through 300 AM CDT... At 208 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Clermont to near Arlington. Movement was northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Elkader around 220 AM CDT. Waukon around 225 AM CDT. Monona and Farmersburg around 230 AM CDT. Lansing, McGregor and Marquette around 235 AM CDT. New Albin around 240 AM CDT. Harpers Ferry around 245 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Volney, Giard, Watson, Red Barn Campground and Churchtown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
